name: Fencing Swordplay 3D
description:
Let’s play fencing! Fencing Swordplay is #1 action-packed, modern swordplay game designed for fencing new comers and fans alike.

En garde! Every thrust and parry of athletic fencing translates beautifully in this #1 realistic 3D fencing game. Immersive free flowing 3D fencing gameplay lets you control the offensive and defensive actions easily. Using techniques from simple thrusts to powerful lunges and devious feints to score points now!

Game Features:
- Modern arenas in US, UK, France, Russia, Australia, India, Egypt
- 40+ challenging levels and quick-fire mini game
- Stunning 3D graphics, cut scenes and animations
